Title: Relates to prohibiting the use of wastewater from high-volume hydraulic fracturing for road and land spreading
Summary: Prohibits the use of wastewater from high-volume hydraulic fracturing for road and land spreading, for dust control or de-icing.
LawCode: Amd ยง23-0101, add ยง23-0315, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the use of wastewater for road and land spreading
